Episode.summary: Enjoying a long-deserved vacation, Scott and Stonebridge are recalled after a fellow Section 20 member dies while pursuing the elusive terrorist al-Zuhari in Beirut. A new lead sends them into the remote jungles of Colombia in pursuit of a known associate of al-Zuhariâ€™s and deep in territory controlled by a powerful drug cartel.
Episode.title: Shadow Warfare: Episode 1
